TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SizeFConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts objects from one type to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Most commonly, the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeFConverter> type converter is used to convert <xref:System.Drawing.Font> instances to and from their corresponding string representations. Access the <xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter> class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
